titleStmt.title: The ordour and doctrine of the generall faste appointed be the generall assemblie of the kirkes of Scotland, halden at Edinburgh the 25. day of December. 1565 ...
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. Presbytery of England.
Knox, John, ca. 1514-1572.
Craig, John, 1512?-1600.

notesStmt.note: Written by John Knox and John Craig--STC.
Reproduction of the original in Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge). Library.
